Account

    • <Unnamed>中Account的使用

      返回Account的<Unnamed>中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法 说明
      Account BankControl.setAcc​(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> list)
      Method setAcc() This method set content of account into an arraylist in the memory with the help of content read.
      参数类型为Account的<Unnamed>中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法 说明
      void BankControl.Active​(Account acc)
      Method Active() This method is used to active suspended account
      void BankControl.Checkinfo​(Account acc)
      Method Checkinfo() This method is user to show all information
      void BankControl.Clear​(Account acc)
      Method Clear() This method is used to clear deposit
      void BankControl.Close​(Account acc)
      Method Close() This method is used for a user to close his account and delete his user file.
      void BankControl.Deposit​(Account acc)
      Method Deposit() This method is used to deposit.
      void BankControl.Login2​(Account acc)
      Method Login2() This method is used to enter the interface of choosing operations after login
      void BankControl.Lookup​(Account acc)
      Method Lookup() This method is used for a user to check balance, unclear money, state of account in the user file.
      void BankControl.Suspend​(Account acc)
      Method Suspend() This method is used to suspend the account
      void BankControl.Withdraw​(Account acc)
      Method Withdraw() This method is used for a user to withdraw money
      void BankControl.writeFile​(Account acct)
      Method wirteFile This method generate file and store all the information
